characters.name: Frieren
characters.description:
Frieren is the protagonist of _Sousou no Frieren_ and [Fern](https://anilist.co/character/183965)'s master. She was the Mage of the Hero Party and traveled alongside Hero [Himmel](https://anilist.co/character/184311/Himmel), Warrior [Eisen](https://anilist.co/character/184312/Eisen), and Priest [Heiter](https://anilist.co/character/184310/Heiter) in a 10-year journey to defeat the Demon King. 

She was a magic prodigy at a young age, with an impressive quantity of mana, which caught the interest of [Flamme](https://anilist.co/character/219733/Flamme), a human wizard who taught her everything there is to know about magic and mana control until she passed away. Frieren persists in collecting magic knowledge no matter how trivial it may be.

characters.name: Fern
characters.description: Fern is the young mage apprentice of [Frieren](https://anilist.co/character/176754/Frieren) and accompanies her as a member of her party. She is an orphaned war refugee originally from the Southern Lands, later adopted by  [Heiter](https://anilist.co/character/184310/Heiter) and placed under Frieren's care.

characters.name: Stark
characters.description: Stark is a warrior who fights alongside [Frieren](https://anilist.co/character/176754/Frieren) and [Fern](https://anilist.co/character/183965/Fern). After his village was attacked by demons, he fled and became [Eisen](https://anilist.co/character/184312/Eisen)'s apprentice. At Eisen's instruction, he joined Frieren's party as their vanguard.

characters.name: Heiter
characters.description: A priest who is a part of the Hero's party. He later took care of [Fern](https://anilist.co/character/183965/Fern) until [Frieren](https://anilist.co/character/176754/Frieren) arrived.

characters.name: Himmel
characters.description: Hero and Leader of the party that defeated the Demon King, and a self-proclaimed handsome narcissist. He cares about his friends and can't help but help those in need. He had a great influence on [Frieren](https://anilist.co/character/176754/Frieren), with whom he had adventures for 10 years.

characters.name: Eisen
characters.description: Dwarf warrior who was a part of the Hero's party, later became a mentor to [Stark](https://anilist.co/character/184313/Stark).

characters.name: Flamme
characters.description: She lived a millennium before the story and was [Frieren](https://anilist.co/character/176754/Frieren)'s teacher.

characters.name: Qual
alt_names: Fuhai no Ken Rou (腐敗の賢老)
characters.description: A feared and powerful demon who served the Demon King.

characters.name: Sein
characters.description: Sein is a Priest from a small village in the Alt Woods. After [Frieren](https://anilist.co/character/176754/Frieren) spotted his talent, he joined her group for a period of time with the goal of reuniting with his childhood friend Gorilla.

characters.name: Aura
alt_names: Dantoudai no Aura (断頭台のアウラ)
characters.description:
Aura is one of the Seven Sages of Destruction directly serving the Demon King. 

~!She later was killed by Frieren after being commanded to kill herself using her own Auserlese.!~

characters.name: Kraft
characters.description: He is an elf that Frieren's group meets in a cabin in the mountains. He's a monk and believed to be the last elf alive until meeting Frieren.

characters.name: Serie
characters.description: An elven mage who is said to possess knowledge about nearly every magic that exists. She was Flamme's master. She founded the Continental Magic Association around 20 years before Himmel's death. First-class mages get the privilege of meeting her and can ask for any magic they desire.

characters.name: Genau
characters.description: First-class mage who was a proctor for the first examination.

characters.name: Laufen
characters.description: A third-class mage. Specializes in magic that makes her move at high speed. Treats Denken as her grandfather.

characters.name: Übel
characters.description: Übel is a third-class mage. Was disqualified in an earlier examination due to killing a first-class wizard. Specializes in magic that allows her to copy the spells of people she can empathize with. Relies mostly on her intuition and is not bound by logical reasoning. ~!Becomes a first-class mage after the examination.!~

characters.name: Denken
characters.description: Denken is an imperial mage of the second-class. In his youth he belonged to an army but became an imperial mage after winning a power struggle. Often calm and calculating, however he still has a fire burning within despite his old age. He saw Frieren as his motivation to become a mage. ~!Becomes a first-class mage after the examination.!~

characters.name: Lawine
characters.description: Lawine is a third-class mage in the Second Party of the First Class Mage Examinations. She specializes in manipulating ice.

characters.name: Kanne
characters.description: Kanne is a third-class mage who graduated from the Academy of Magic. She is childhood friends and classmates with [Lawine](https://anilist.co/character/293727), and the two entered the first-class mage exam together. In the first stage of the exam, she was paired with Lawine and [Frieren](https://anilist.co/character/176754).

characters.name: Edel
characters.description: Edel is a second-class mage in the Seventeenth Party, alongside Blei and Dunst, of the First Class Mage Exam. She specializes in Hypnosis Magic.

characters.name: Lügner
characters.description: Lügner was a demon who served [Aura the Guillotine](https://anilist.co/character/219110/Aura).

characters.name: Linie
characters.description: Linie is a Demon working under [Aura](https://anilist.co/character/219110/Aura). Under Aura's instruction, she was sent to assist [Lügner](https://anilist.co/character/316985/Lgner) alongside [Draht](https://anilist.co/character/316987/Draht) to perform negotiations with [Graf Granat](https://anilist.co/character/318147/Granat-Hakushaku).

characters.name: Draht
characters.description: Draht was a demon who served [Aura the Guillotine](https://anilist.co/character/219110/Aura).

characters.name: Granat Hakushaku
characters.description: Ruler of Graf Granat's Domain, a fortified city in the Northern Lands constantly at war with Aura.

characters.name: Akuma no Ko
characters.description: A young demon girl that ate the daughter of two villagers in a town the Hero Party visited. She called for "mother" when Himmel attempted to kill her, and the village chief takes her in as his own family and tries to give her a chance to atone.

characters.name: Stoltz
characters.description: Stark's older brother, referred to as the strongest warrior in the village.

characters.name: Tsurugi no Sato no Satoosa
characters.description: The current chief of the Village of the Sword. Her position was inherited. She is young for the position and postures to try to make up for her lack of height, but when faced with danger or matters regarding the Hero's Blade, she is collected and calm.

characters.name: Wirbel
characters.description: Second-class mage and the leader of the eighth party during the first stage of the First Class Mage Exam. He is the captain of the Northern Magic Corps and is thus a very experienced mage. Specializes in magic that restrains the opponent when their body is in full-view.

characters.name: Richter
characters.description: Second-class mage who participates in the First Class Mage Exam at the same time as Frieren and Fern. He owns a magical store in Äußerst where he specializes in repairing broken staves.

characters.name: Ehre
characters.description: Second-class mage in the Eighth Party, alongside Wirbel and Scharf, in the First Class Mage Exam. Fern feels that she is the strongest within both the Fourth and Eighth parties.

characters.name: Land
characters.description: Second-class mage in the Fourth Party of the First Class Mage Examination. He specializes in illusion magic.

characters.name: Sense
characters.description: First-class mage that is proctoring the Second Exam of the First Class Mage Examination. She is a solemn person who rarely speaks.

characters.name: Blei
characters.description:
Participant in the examination for the title of mage first class.
~!Sacrificed himself to help Dunst deliver important information to his comrades in the lower level of the dungeon.!~

characters.name: Falsch
characters.description: First class mage. Acts as an observer in magical exams.

characters.name: Länge
characters.description: Participant in the examination for the title of mage first class. Slightly distracted girl. Likes to read books and learn new spells.

characters.name: Methode
characters.description: A mage that can use restraint and mental manipulation magic. Good at detecting mana and can use simple recovery magic.

characters.name: Senshi Gorilla
characters.description: Childhood friend of [Sein](https://anilist.co/character/205177) who dreamed of going on an adventure and becoming a legendary hero. A long time ago, he asked Sein to start adventuring with him, which Sein refused and regretted since.

characters.name: Orden
characters.description: Nobleman presiding over the Vorig Fortified City and the current head of the Orden family, one of the Three Great Knightly Houses of the Northern Lands.

characters.name: Gabel
characters.description: Servant of [Lord Orden](https://anilist.co/character/326825).

characters.name: Voll Jii
characters.description: Elderly Dwarf warrior and a long-time friend of Frieren. He resides in a village in the Klar Region.

characters.name: Lernen
characters.description:
An old friend of Denken. First Class Mage and Serie's apprentice. Rarely acts directly, preferring stealth.
~!Helped in the extraction and transfer of information necessary for the liberation of Denken's hometown.!~

characters.name: Scharf
characters.description: Scharf is a third-class mage and member of the eighth party along with Wirbel and Ehre for the First Class Mage Examination.

characters.name: Toun
characters.description: Participant in the examination for the title of mage first class. Distrustful and self-confident mage.

characters.name: Dünste
characters.description: Participant in the First Class Mage Exam.

characters.name: Stark no Chichi
characters.description: [Stark](https://anilist.co/character/184313/Stark)'s father is a harsh, militant man. He considers Stark a failure. He is also strict with the other warriors of the village, scolding them for their pathetic display against a monster and praising [Stoltz](https://anilist.co/character/319598/Stoltz), who he considered the pride of the village, for defeating it while keeping his white cape pristine.

characters.name: Ou-sama
characters.description: The King resides in the Royal Capital in the Central Lands. The King's influence reaches across the Central and Northern Lands. When the Hero Party first set out on their journey to defeat the Demon King, he provided them with ten copper coins.

characters.name: Yakusou-ka
characters.description: A herbalist that lives in a village in the Turk Region.

characters.name: Roujin
characters.description: An elder wearing a straw hat in the village by where Qual is sealed. Himmel would talk with him when he visited to check on the condition of the seal.

characters.name: Arakuremono A
characters.description: An adventurer that hangs out in a tavern in Warm.

characters.name: Arakuremono B
characters.description: An adventurer that hangs out in a tavern in Warm.

characters.name: Sonchou A
alt_names: Granz Kaikyou no Sonchou (グランツ海峡の村長)
characters.description: An elder that lives in the Granz Channel. He offers [Frieren](https://anilist.co/character/176754/Frieren) and [Fern](https://anilist.co/character/183965/Fern) a fake of one of the [Great Mage Flamme](https://anilist.co/character/219733/Flamme)'s grimoires as payment for cleaning up the shore of the channel by the New Year's Anniversary and checks up on them throughout their stay in town.

characters.name: Pan-ya Tenshu
characters.description: A kind woman that owns a bakery in the Granz Channel. She gives [Fern](https://anilist.co/character/183965/Fern) extra bread for being a regular customer while [Frieren](https://anilist.co/character/176754/Frieren) and Fern stay in town to clean up the shore.

characters.name: Murabito A
characters.description: A old lady that is seen taking care of two young children in Riegel Canyon.

characters.name: Murabito C
characters.description: A man who live in the village [Stark](https://anilist.co/character/184313/Stark) protected in Riegel Canyon.

characters.name: Kodomo A
characters.description: A child from Riegel Canyon. He adores [Stark](https://anilist.co/character/184313/Stark) and seek his attention.

characters.name: Tenshu
characters.description: A woman who live in the village [Stark](https://anilist.co/character/184313/Stark) protected in Riegel Canyon.

characters.name: Mago
characters.description: A child from Riegel Canyon. He adores [Stark](https://anilist.co/character/184313/Stark) and seek his attention.

characters.name: Joudai
alt_names: Jousai Toshi Waal no Joudai (城塞都市ヴァールの城代)

characters.name: Master
alt_names: Jousai Toshi Waal no Master (城塞都市ヴァールのマスター)

characters.name: Sokkin A
alt_names: Granat-ryou no Sokkin (グラナト領の側近)

characters.name: Sokkin B
alt_names: Granat-ryou no Sokkin (グラナト領の側近)

characters.name: Mut
characters.description: Lord Orden's youngest son and the next heir of the Orden family.

characters.name: Wirt
characters.description: Lord Orden's oldest son. Wirt passed away in a melee against demon forces but managed to kill the enemy general.

characters.name: Lecker
characters.description: The head chef for the restaurant Bell in Äußerst.
